Name: "Magical Talent" Rudeus
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 魔術 (Mage)
Text:
[C] If there are 5 or more cards in your hand, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this to an empty
Front Row Center Slot.

Name: "Live Seriously" Rudeus
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 魔術 (Mage)
Text:
[C] If you have 4 or more ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, this gets -1
Level while in your hand.
[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 6 or higher,
this gains +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +4500 Power and the
following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[C] During
Battles involving this, neither player may play BACKUP from hand."

Name: "In the Sunlight" Rudeus
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 魔術 (Mage)
Text:
[A] CX COMBO When "Little Mage" is placed in your Climax Zone, choose 1
of your other Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for
the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, look at up to
4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Six-Sided World::
Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and
put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room."
[S] [(1) Discard a '"Genius Swordfighter" Paul' from hand to the Waiting Room,
Rest 2 of your ::Six-Sided World:: Characters] Choose up to 2 Characters with
::Maid:: and/or ::Sister (Sst-MTI):: and return them to hand.

Name: "Adventuring Party Dead End" Rudeus
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 魔術 (Mage)
Text:
[C] Your other '"Adventuring Party Dead End" Eris' and '"Adventuring
Party Dead End" Ruijerd' gains +2000 Power and the following ability. "[C] This
cannot be chosen by your Opponent's effects".
[A] [(1) Rest 2 Characters] Put top 2 card of your deck into your Waiting Room,
choose one of ::Six-Sided World:: character with level X or lower, and return
back to your hand. X is the total level of those cards.

Name: "Daily Growth" Rudeus
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 魔術 (Mage)
Text:
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a '"Magical Talent" Rudeus' from your hand to the
Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if there is no Climax in
your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1
"From Master to Disciple", place it to your Climax Zone, and Shuffle your
Library.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is
higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If
so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

Name: "Words of Encouragement" Rudeus
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 魔術 (Mage)

[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Aqua Heartia" is in your Climax Zone and

Character in your Waiting Room, return it to your hand, and for the turn this
gains the following ability. "[A] When this card's Damage is Cancelled, until
the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains +4000 Power."

-1 Level while in your hand.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed
from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Clock
in your Stock.

[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the

Name: "Genius Swordfighter" Paul
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 剣士 (Swordfighter)
Text:
[C] If this is in the Front Row, all your ::Six-Sided World:: Characters
gain +1500 Power.
[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check
twice during this attack's Trigger Step.
[A] [Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room] This ability activates
up to once per turn. During this card's Battle, when Damage you have received
is Cancelled, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If that
card has a Soul Trigger Icon, you may pay cost. If so, deal the same amount of
Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

Traits: None

Name: Man-God
Traits: None
Text:
If you don't have a ::Six-Sided World:: Character, you cannot play this
from hand.
Perform the following 3 effects once in any order.
"Choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and either Stand it and move it to an
empty Slot on your Opponent's Stage, or choose another of your Opponent's
Characters and Stand and Swap both Characters."
"Place all of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room, and place the same
number of cards from the top of their Library to their Stock."
"Choose a Climax in your Opponent's Waiting Room, then put all cards in their
Waiting Room other than the chosen card into their Library and your Opponent
Shuffles their Library."

Text:

-1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, this gains
+1500 Power and the following ability. "[A] [Discard a card from hand to the
Waiting Room] When this Reverses, you may pay cost. If so, return this to
hand."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your
Library. If that card is a ::Six-Sided World:: Character or "You Can't Buy
Dere!" you may Deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur. Put
the revealed card back)

Name: "Strength Hidden Inside" Eris
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 剣士 (Swordfighter)
Text:
[A] CX COMBO When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1
"Special" in your Waiting Room, return it to your hand, and for the turn this
gets +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this
card's Damage is not cancelled, if "Special" is in your Climax Zone, you may
pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage cancel can occur)

Name: "Adventuring Party Dead End" Eris
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 剣士 (Swordfighter)
Text:
[C] If you have another '"Adventuring Party Dead End" Rudeus' in your
Back Row, this gains +2000 Power.
[C] If you have another '"Adventuring Party Dead End" Ruijerd', this gains
+3000 Power.

Name: "Angelic Sleeping Face" Eris
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 剣士 (Swordfighter)
Text:
[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may choose 1 of your
Opponent's Level 0 or lower Front Row Characters and place it in their Waiting
Room.

Name: "Mastering Magic" Eris
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 剣士 (Swordfighter)
Text:
[C] During your turn, if you have 2 or more other ::Six-Sided World::
Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this becomes Reversed in
battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may
Rest this. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the
revealed card back where it was)

Name: "Boreas Family Bodyguard" Ghislane
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 剣士 (Swordfighter)
Text:
[C] If you have another Character with "Rudeus" or "Eris" in name, this
gains +1500 Power.
[C] If the Cost of the Character Opposite this is 0 or lower, this does not
Reverse.

Name: "Beast Tribe" Ghislane
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 剣士 (Swordfighter)
Text:
[C] For each other ::Six-Sided World:: Character in your Back Row this
gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room] When
"Sword King Ghislane" is placed to your Climax Zone and this is in your Front
Row and you have 2 or more other ::Six-Sided World:: Characters, you may pay
cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Level 3 or lower Characters,
place it in their Waiting Room, and reveal the top card of your Library. If
that is a ::Six-Sided World:: Character, choose 1 of your Opponent's Back Row
Level 2 or lower Characters and place it in the Waiting Room.

Name: Phillip Boreas Greyrat
Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 貴族 (Aristocracy)

Beastperson Maid" in your Waiting Room and put them face-down under this as

a card from hand to the Waiting Room]

your deck.

+500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest 2 of your Characters] Flip over the top 4 cards of
your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. If there is a "Boreas
Beastperson Maid" among those cards, search your Library for up to 1 RED
Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and Shuffle your
Library.

Traits: 六面世界 (Six-Sided World), 貴族 (Aristocracy)

of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [(2) Discard 2 cards from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you
may pay cost. If so, Deal 2 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

Name: Little Master
Traits: None
Text: [C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
